main event: An unidentified flying object was sighted in Mangham, Louisiana on 22 May 1960.
interesting points: The UFO was reported as a bright object that was steady, sometimes brilliant and sometimes dull., Major Brantley of the Air Force reported seeing a metallic, circular object from about 40 miles west of Alexandria, Louisiana., The sighting lasted for 11 minutes and occurred from 12:30 AM to 12:41 AM., Multiple witnesses reported similar sightings in the Mangham area, including a local sheriff and a line maintenance man., The object changed shape during observation, resembling a balloon and sometimes appearing shiny or dull.
witness description: observers included a line maintenance man, a housewife, and a parish sheriff, all from Mangham, Louisiana.
